comment: great app wish more people would be aware of these logical fallacies, I am definitely going to spread this app.      edit: I'd have one suggestion that would be helpfull during discussions, it would be nice if the text could be copied or shared in order to quickly point people to their flawed argumentation.

Thank you for downloading! I also wish people were more aware of the fallacies they make and participate in.. It's why I made this app.. Anyways, I hope you get good use out of this, please do spread it about :)

title: Thank you.
comment: Fun. Useful and works on BB10 as well

Thank you for the review and the support! Much appreciated. 

It works on BB10??? That is news to me, thanks for letting me know :)

title: Great app
comment: Really eye pleasing and good content! People need to learn this

Thank you very much for the 5 stars! Very much appreciated.

I highly agree with you, many people need to learn how to perform rational debates, so I hope this app will help educate those people. For us, it's a handy reference for the fallacies we already avoid making :) Have a good week!
Thank you for the support! I hope you enjoy it. :)

title: Nice
comment: Please add more fallacies and examples too.

I will be adding more fallacies, but I think I have covered the main ones. The app only contains formal fallacies, so fallacies like "No true Scotsman" will be excluded because those are known as informal fallacies.

Are there any fallacies in particular that you would like to see? 

Thank you for supporting the app, and the wonderful rating. <3

title: Why not 5 stars?
comment: Nothing here to complain about. Delivers exactly what it promises and no accessing other functions on the phone. Works great on Galaxy S5.

Thank you kind sir for the support & the 5 star review. There is always room for improvement (as there is in everything in life) so I will work on the other reviewers' request and hopefully obtain a 5 start rating from him/her :)
